title: Mike.Tyson.History.14.DVD.Box-Set.DVDRip.XviD-SZLS
description:
Includes special features.

Res: 512 x 384
Display aspect ratio: 4:3
Fps: 29.970
Bit rate: 1 400 Kbps
Format: MP3
Bit rate: 128 Kbps
Channel(s): 2 channels
Sampling rate: 44.1 KHz
---------------------------------------------



It is the most comprehensive and high quality DVD collection showcasing Mike Tyson's amazing 20-year boxing career. This is what all the fans have been waiting for, every fight in full with ring entrances (where available), chaptered rounds, amateur fight action, exclusive training footage, documentaries and interviews.

This DVD set doesn't just have every single professional Mike Tyson fight ever recorded in FULL, but follows the career of the ex-heavyweight king all the way from the amateurs, right up until his final fight in 2005 against Kevin McBride.

Interview with Cus D'Amato and Tyson with Howard Cosell

Disc 5
Tyson v Tony Tucker, Las Vegas, W 12

Special Features

Disc 7
Tyson v James Douglas, Tokyo, Japan, KO by 10
(Lost World Heavyweight Title)
Tyson v Henry Tillman, Las Vegas, KO 1

Special Features
Buster Dougles talks through the entire fight explaining his feelings coming into the fight as the
biggest underdog and how he overcame the odds to defeat Mike Tyson.

Disc 8
Tyson v Alex Stewart, Atlantic City, N.J., TKO 1
Tyson v Donovan Ruddock, Las Vegas, TKO 7
Tyson v Donovan Ruddock, Las Vegas, W 10

Special Features
Spike Lee feature on Tyson with great footage and interviews
Training special following Tyson's daily training routine and an interview
inside the famous Catskill Gym where it all started.

Disc 9
Tyson v Peter McNeeley, Las Vegas, WDSQ 1

Tyson v Frank Bruno II, Las Vegas, TKO 3
(Won WBC Heavyweight Title)
Tyson v Bruce Seldon, Las Vegas, TKO 1
(Won WBA Heavyweight Title)

Special Features
Training footage including a heavy bag workout, a sparring special and a training montage
featuring loads of rare Tyson training video all pieced together.

Disc 10 - Holyfield Special

(Lost WBA Heavyweight Title)
